explanation: The stage direction describes a sequence of sounds and time passing, which has a narrative quality. It includes descriptions of noises from dogs, cars, silence, and the crowing of a rooster, illustrating the passage of time in a setting, thus fitting into the narration category.
stgdir: Abois de chiens sur la route... Autos qui passent... Silence. Deux heures, bruits d'autos... Silence. Trois heures... Chants du coq se répandant dans la campagne... Silence. Quatre heures...
